channel.title: Quick on Val Knight's Text Dumping Ground
channel.description: Recent content in Quick on Val Knight's Text Dumping Ground

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi! I’m Vallerie. I try to make things which are pretty cool (not always techy things, just, things).

I go by she/her or they/them pronouns - using either is totally cool!

I’m based in the UK (as of right now).

My Github is ValKnight - check it out if you want, I try to put most things on there (things non digital I’ll throw photos of on here).

ðŸŒˆ

item.title: The first post
item.description:
Hi all - this is the first post I’m making here.

I have this space mainly because I’m annoyed at all the other options for putting my words make me hand my soul over to some shady company. While GitHub is no better (oh BOY they’re not better), at least here, I can take this site to another host relatively painlessly.

I hope to be doing more creative things in the future. I want to have a play around with Processing and see if I can make anything cool with that, which I’ll be posting here.

Anyways, that’s me out! Have a great day all of you, and hope to be writing here soon.

- Vallerie

[she/they]
